nodes.text: IG-113 was an IG-100 MagnaGuard serving the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars on board a Munificent-class star frigate, who was bigger than other MagnaGuards. At about 21 BBY, the Republic shot down the frigate, although IG-113 survived the crash. The Republic sent down Clone troopers to finish off the remaining battle droids, but they encountered Death Watch resistance. A Jedi Knight investigated the wreck and found IG-113, destroying him.

IG-113 first appeared in "Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures (video game)" at the Skirmish on Carlac combat zone. After defeating IG-113 many times, the player is given IG-113's electrostaff. He very rarely appeared, as players would have to wait for half an hour for him spawn.
